    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NormalWeapon, SpecialWeapons
    public abstract class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    the bridge between every kind of weapon

                           java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> effects,

                    throws WeaponNotLoadedException,

                           PlayerAlreadyDeadException,
                           PlayerInDifferentCellException,
                           UncorrectDistanceException,

                           PrecedentPlayerNeededException
